meanings.definition: A person who works at a carnival.
meanings.sent1: The carnies set up the games and rides at the carnival.
meanings.sent2: We saw the carnies selling tickets and popcorn at the carnival.
meanings.sent3: The carnies joked with the children, making them laugh at the carnival.
meanings.sent4: The carnies were like magical performers, bringing joy to the carnival.
meanings.sent5: The colorful outfits of the carnies made them stand out at the carnival.

meanings.sent1: The group of carnies traveled together to different carnivals.
meanings.sent2: We met some friendly carnies who shared stories about their travels.
meanings.sent3: The carnies' camaraderie was evident as they worked together.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of people, the carnies stood out with their unique skills.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the carnies filled the air, creating a lively atmosphere.
